Blog.post: Sometimes we close our eyes and just listen to the echoes of our hearts. We all fall in luv and there are times when we love so much that we lose ourselves in our own emotions. More often than not, we wonder why there are love that grows, and love that grows cold. We would start to search for answers and try to find where love has gone wrong. But in the end, we find ourselves where we started for we cannot question love when it has its own reasons. Love will always be as it always has been... silent, mysterious and deeply profound.Many of us believe that love is forever, that love never dies, only to be disillusioned in the end when we find our hands empty and our hearts longing. We mistakenly have looked at love as a need to be fulfilled. But love is only a gift given to us. We should not hold it in our hands for we may never find the strength to let it go when it decides to leave. We should only embrace its warmth and glow while it last and then freely open our arms when its time to say goodbye.When we fall in luv with someone, we don't want that feeling to end for it is everything we are, everything that we wanted to be. We pray that love will stay and grow in our hearts. But, if it doesn't then we should never let our lives be taken by it, for life should not end where heartaches begin.There is always reason why we have to move on. When we have to say good-bye to the feelings we wanted to stay forever, let us not wave our hands with a heavy heart. For love will have to set its wings free and find the place where it belongs.We may have lost it but then again, when we close our eyes and listen to the echoes of our hearts, we will hear that feeling resounding silently forever.Then we'll know that it has never left us, for the good that we have become because of love will always stay. It will always be there reminding us that we should be thankful and happy, not because we have lost luv, but because, for once in our lives, that feeling lived in our hearts and made us happy.

~Life is like an onion; you peel off one layer at a time and sometimes you weep~ Well, i woke up at 4 a.m. this morning. Dad had surgery and we had to be at the hospital at 5. Wanna talk about a stressful day?? Cuz that's exactly what i had. We arrived and had to wait until 7 which is when his surgery was scheduled. Then he went in, they called to inform us that he went under and there were no complications thus far. Then came the 2 and a half hour wait. Waiting for word that it was over. Finally after meeting many other patients' families, and many spanish worksheets later, the doctor came with word that he was out of surgery and in recovery. This meant that I was off to school, not knowing when he would wake up or when i would be able to talk to him. Well, I arrived at school a little into second block, extremely tired. I wasn't in the mood to do anything so i just took a little nap in guidance....nice n relaxing...din't last to long. So then, off to lunch...im still way out of it wondering whether or not he has woken up yet. So, i eat cookies cuz my stomach can't hold much else....i call my dad's room once..no answer...this is me getting a little bit scared... So then, i go back to the table set down the cell and do a lil hw. Well, the infamous haeger comes along and confiscates the cell. How awesome...can't even call my own dad to see if he's allrite in the hospital, wow. So i get called to ver boomen thinking i'm really in for it ya kno, him being the dean of students and all. I go in, not knowing what to expect and he starts talkin. "I would have waited to call you down at the end of the day, but i recognized your name and i just wanted to let you kno....you had an awesome game last nite." So he rambles on about basketball things, gives me the cell and i'm on my way. But of course before i leave he asks why i'm crying. I say it's obviously not becuz of the cell phone being taken away, im not that gay. So i tell him the dad situation and he allows me to call once more...no answer yet again. So, he tells me to come back after 3rd hour to try again. Well, i'm on my way to 3rd hour...i start bawling, and after a hug, balda convinces me to go to guidance so back to guidance i go. (i'm obviously not gunna walk into spanish class crying...albers would probly go nuts). So i go to guidance, talk to jedlicka, chill out a little bit and make my way to spanish. Things go well and after that i try yet once again to getta hold of my dad, but to no avail. By this time i'm getting extremely scared and emotional...i dont really kno what to think and all i wanna do is getta hold of my dad. I try to go the rest of the day, one whole block plus advisement or "extended learning time" if you will, just thinkn, i'll be able to talk to him after school. So, off to key club, after which i receive a hug from a very good friend, and makes me feel sooo much better. I can't even describe how much that meant to me. But, i get home, fall asleep becuz of my sleep deprivation as of last nite and eventually wake up to my brother asking me sum question which i dont remember...my answer being no...and falling back asleep. Well, after this, i wake up to an empty house...not knowing where anyone is and eventually i get a call from my mom at the hospital...should have known. I FINALLY got to talk to my dad so all my fears are gone and everything's good. He's kinda drugged up on morphine so i couldnt understand a whole lot but hearing his voice and knowing he's ok just lifted a lot of stress off my shoulders. I can tell you this once again, if i didn't have my friends, i dont kno what i would have done today. Thanx to all you guys and girls that care about me and are helpn me thru this. It's not easy but without you guys, it would be so much worse................

I took my love, I took it down Climbed a mountain and I turned around And I saw my reflection in the snow covered hills Til the landslide brought it down. Oh, mirror in the sky -what is love? -can the child within my heart rise above? -can I sail thru the changin' ocean tides? -can I handle the seasons of my life? I dont kno..... Well, I've been afraid of changin Cuz I've built my life around you But time makes you bolder Even children get older And I'm getting older too Take my love, take it down Climb a mountain and turn around -and if you see my reflection in the snow covered hills well the landslide will bring it down

I'm in a quoting mood...think about some of these... *Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart." Washington Irving* *Hatred never kills, love never dies. Such is the vast difference between the two. What is obtained by love is retained for all time. What is obtained by hatred proves a burden in reality for it increases hatred.* Gandhi The sage said, "The best thing is not to hate anyone, only to love. That is the only way out of it. As soon as you have forgiven those whom you hate, you have gotten ride of them. Then you have no reason to hate them; you just forget" *Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings.* *The remarkable thing is that we really love our neighbor as ourselves: we do unto others as we do unto ourselves. We hate others when we hate ourselves. We are tolerant toward others when we tolerate ourselves. We forgive others when we forgive ourselves. We are prone to sacrifice others when we are ready to sacrifice ourselves.*

*That thing. That moment when you kiss someone and everything around you becomes hazy and the only thing in focus is you and this person. And you realize that that person is the only person you're supposed to kiss for the rest of your life. And for one moment you get this amazing gift, and you wanna laugh, and you wanna cry... 'cause you feel so lucky that you found it and so scared that it'll go away all at the same time.* I miss that feeling...and if u kno me...u've probly noticed i haven't been the happiest person this week. Despite the dreaded finals and my deprivation of sleep making me crabby, there have been numerous other things. I miss....i miss everything...everything that used to be...that used to be good. I dont kno how to explain it, it just kinda sux. No matter how I hard i try...i can't let go and it's killing me inside. (If you dont understand what the hell im talkn bout...dnt worry, ur probly one of many). I still get butterflies, i'm definitely jealous (yes i can admit it), and this...this whole thing just doesn't seem real to me. It's like it's a gigantic nightmare and I just NEED someone to wake me up. I guess things are tough...and im not strong enough to endure most of it. Along with those things comes my dad. His surgery is in 8 days and its becoming scarier each day. And i guess my parents are both havn surgery in the same week which i was not informed about. Dont ya think thats kind of a good thing to tell ur children?? Guess not. On a better note, i had a good day...probly failed my finals, but the after school part was dominant. Arby's & Culvers was good, lol and of course Matt's was fun too...til Ericia and i had to go to practice, along with Brad who had wrestling, but thats besides the point...it was a good time, lets just leave it at that...and DJ!...TURN TABLE!!! God, i love all those guys, couldn't have fun w/o em. And yes, I mean ALL of you! Well, i'm tired...7 hours in 2 days is just not enough sleep for me so until next time...good nite!!! "I know God only gives you what you can handle...but does he have to trust me so much?!"

After reading Giesen's blog tonite, i have realized one thing: I'm letting drama control my life. There are so many things i have been worrying about, thinking about, hell even dreaming about, things that i shouldnt be. So many things have been going on in my life...My dad's cancer, the kyle thing, basketball, things that just happen on a daily basis. Yes, there are some of these things that i should be concerned about, but i need to learn NOT to dwell on them. Some things in life just need to be forgotten, other need more attention payed to them, and some just dont need to occur at all. I want to leave all the drama behind me, with the exception of my dad. I want to be me, not me with drama takin over my life. This break was the best break i could possibly have. Busy every single day with people. Whether we had anything specific to do or not, we were always together. The TRUE friends that I have. The true friends that i care about. I have all the friends i need rite there. Yea there's always gonna be the one that i would give the world for but he doesnt give a rats ass back...but thats just something i have to forget about, something i can't dwell on no matter how much it tears me apart. Some people are just downright evil and pathetic and all they want in life is to be popular and better than others. No matter who they have to hurt on their way up. Just remember whoever you step on on the way up, ur gonna meet on ur way back down. Shit happens in life, but no matter how tough the shit, life does go on. And i have learned that. I'm gonna take what Giesen did for his life, and transform it into something i can use for my life. The teenage years are hard and I for one kno that, but im not gonna let the drama, the obstacles, and the heartbreaks take over my life. I'm gonna let them make me a stronger and better person. And thanx to my true friends and family, that is totally possible. ~If you cannot solve it, it is not a problem - it is reality~ Anonymous ~Life is like Ice Cream, enjoy it before it melts.~ Anonymous ~Everyday is a good day, some are just better than others~Anonymous -:-Worry about your character and not your reputation, because your character is who you are, and your reputation is only what people think about you-:-

~Maybe this world is another planet's Hell~ -Aldous Huxley- Wow...society is so fucked up...thats the only way i can describe it... It's so awesome though, its hilarious and wierd, and even disgusting, all at the same time. Life always brings those little surprises, sum good, sum bad...either way...they've treated me well so far...despite a few little heartbreaks here and there, lol. But hey, shit like that happens to the best of us. So today is the last day of break thats actually worth something. Tomorrow's a sunday and not to many ppl do stuff on sundays...specially those procrastinators who wait till the last second to do their hw. But we'll see if the boyz n i get together before the dreaded school starts again. This break has definitely been awesome because of them and of course a select few others and we can't forget the absent one. That was probly the best part ever. :-D Ya, i kno, i can be harsh, but hey life can be 20 times more harsh, dont we all kno that. Everythings fallen into place these past few months. I kno my true friends, and really...thats all i need to kno. Whether they're all the way in Madison or a few streets over, i love them all. U all kno who u are. And if u dnt kno...u should probly ask...just a suggestion. ~Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.~ - Albert Einstein - So tonite we had a game against Appleton North. They're a good team, i must admit. They've got agility, very quick, and VERY lucky. U kno how that goes. I wont get into that or this will end up being a 10 page paper. But no, we did not win, but we didn't lose either. We gained experience, and we kno what we'll have to do to dominate next time. "We didn't lose the game; we just ran out of time." - Vince Lombardi - Yup, so thats just a very small insignificant insight to whats goin thru my head...i think i'd have to be here forever if you were ever going to understand me and whats goin on up there...hell...i dnt even think i understand half the time...but until next time, good nite!

I do want to say one thing...i have an AWESOME group of friends. You guys dominate! I have the best times with you and w/o any one of you my life would be so much duller. Keep the good times rollin...u kno how we roll. :-)

Thinkin about a lotta things lately...nothing in particular; just everything; total random stuff. I wont punish you with the details, but shit's goin thru my head... -:-Does the past always have to stay -:-Deeply embedded into ones soul, -:-Continuing to destroy the mind of another -:-Knowing now there is never an escape. -:- -:-Do we ever learn how to control-:- -:-The hatred we hold so deep inside-:- -:-And be able to live our lives-:- -:-Without all the hurt that others have planted-:- -:- -:-When does the sadness and anger ever end,-:- -:-Or does it linger on till insanity hits-:- -:-Feeling like no matter how much you scrub,-:- -:-The germs have still infected your blood.-:- -:- -:-Not wanting to hear or see from them again,-:- -:-But only to try and keep some self control,-:- -:-And not all the depression that soaks through you,-:- -:-As the water does when standing underneath.-:- -:- -:-Never understanding why so many others,-:- -:-Have to feed & live only by hurting another,-:- -:-Seeing them cry and ache for that love,-:- -:-The love that all friends are supposed to give.-:-

Ok, so I have the bestest friend in the whole wide world....and i sooo have MOSTEST on u Susie!! lol...k so, im gunna list the reasons on why we're such GREAT friends...and then sum wierd stuff u should kno bout our friendship...cuz yes, i kno you wanna kno it! Well, first of all, we are both shy but when we get together...NOTHING shuts us up, and trust me, i mean nothing. We get along so well and can trust each other with anything. There's so much we kno about each other, its scary. We finish each others sentences, we kno what the other's thinking. And we always kno when the other one is down or in pain (since we all kno we're both always killing ourselves) . Ok, well now that you kno we have like everything in common and are CRAZY when we're together, i'll get to the even wierder stuff. Ok, so last Christmas, we got each other Christmas presents like any normal best friends would. Well, she was in madison, i was here in Appleton & we refused to mail each other the presents...we had to give them to each other in person. Well we were on the phone, chit chattn it up and we were so curious so we each started giving little clues as to what we got the other person. Well, it started sounding like we got the same thing for each other...but how could that be??? We got such personal things (u'll understand when im finished) So finally we get to the point that we agree we got the same thing for each other....we read the serial number and precisely what we expected, it's the same!!! LOL, we both got each other photo albums from "things remembered" or sum store w/a wierd name like that....they were both blue, both had stuff engraved on them....both had the same thing engraved in them...whatta coincidence...Very very wierd....but the fun doesnt stop there. Down the line we find that we have the same shoes, same coats (not so much a coincidence), same hats, braided our hair on the same day, same shirts....the list goes on n on....Basically, we were destined to be friends, dont think i could live w/o her. and hopefully the feeling's mutual...:-P She's my bestest bestest friend and helps me through everything! And vice versa of course. Oh and she's gotta be an awesome friend if she spends her spring break COMING TO SCHOOL WITH YOU?! I mean who goes to school on their spring break?? Obviously Susan Carlson...My best friend. :-D

A simple friend has never seen u cry. A real friend has shoulders soggy from ur tears. A simple friend thinks the friendship is over when u have an argument. A real friend knows that its not a friendship until after you've had a fight. A simple friend hates it when u call after he's gone to bed. A real friend asks why u took so long to call. A simple friend, when visiting, acts like a guest. A real friend opens ur fridge and helps himself. A simple friend wonders about ur romantic history. A real friend could blackmail u with it. A simple friend expects you to always be there for them. A real friend expects to always be there for you. Which one are you???

Dreams really do come true?? Good one....life can never be simple. There will always be those so-called friends that can't just let you live your life how you wanna live it...and then you let them get to you and change your life just for the approval of your friends. Sounds immature doesn't it? Yeah, I kinda thought so too. Yeah, life's hard to deal with, especially when you want something and all your friends disagree. But don't you think that if you want that something, your friends should just be happy for you? After all, it is your life, isn't it? I suppose with some people, it's more difficult than others...but in time they're gonna have to realize that if they are your true friends, they won't stop you from your dreams, the things you want in life, having your own opinion, any of that. But you have to start by standing up for yourself...and if you dont do that....ur fucked.

I guess dreams really do come true....

A well-known speaker started off his seminar by holding up a $20.00 bill. In the room of 200, he asked, "Who would like this $20 bill?" Hands started going up. He said, "I am going to give this $20 to one of you, but first let me do this. He proceeded to crumple the $20 dollar bill up. He then asked, "Who still wants it?" Still the hands were up in the air. Next he dropped it on the ground and started to grind it into the floor with his shoe. He picked it up, now crumpled and dirty. "Now, who still wants it?" Still the hands went into the air. "My friends, we have all learned a very valuable lesson. No matter what was done to the money, you still wanted it because it did not decrease in value. It was still worth $20. Many times in our lives, we are dropped, crumpled, and ground into the dirt by the decisions we make and the circumstances that come our way. We feel as though we are worthless." "But no matter what has happened or what will happen, you will never lose your value. Dirty or clean, crumpled or finely creased, you are still priceless to those who DO love you. The worth of our lives comes not in what we do or who we know, but by WHO WE ARE." "You are special - Don't EVER forget it." Count your blessings, not your problems. Never be afraid to try something new. And remember: amateurs built the ark ...professionals built the Titanic! hehe...luv u all!! Until Next Time, Your Carebear :-P

"*Have you ever noticed that the worst way to miss someone is when they are right beside you, and yet you can never have them... when the moment you can't feel them under your fingertips, you miss them? Have you ever wondered which hurts the most: saying something and wishing you had not, or saying nothing and wishing you had? Don't be afraid to tell someone you love them. If you do, they might break your heart... But if you don't, you might break theirs. Have you ever decided not to become a couple because you were so afraid of losing what you already had with that person? Your heart decides who it likes and who it doesn't. You can't tell your heart what to do. It does it on its own... when you least suspect it, or even when you don't want it to. Have you ever wanted to love someone with everything you had, but that other person was too afraid to let you? Too many of us stay walled because we are too afraid to care too much... for fear that the other person doesn't care as much or even at all. Have you ever loved someone and they had absolutely no idea whatsoever? Or fell for your best friend in the entire world, and then sat around and watched him/her fall for someone else? Have you ever denied your feelings for someone because your fear of rejection was too hard to handle? We tell lies when we are afraid... afraid of what we don't know, afraid of what will be found out about us. But everytime we tell a lie, the thing we fear grows stronger. Life is all about risks and it requires you to jump. Don't be a person who has to look back and wonder what they would have or could have had. No one waits forever* " Very nicely put Felicia....very nice...

I'll explain... Ok, so this white car goes thru a red light, another car hits it, tire comes lose, car loses control....heads towards a clan of 8th grade girls standing at the median. So one girl tries to push the other out of the way. Misses, and the corner of the sign goes into her shoulder. Bloody painful. So then the car hits the other girl, sam, she flies in the air and then the car manages to also run her over. The skin from her ankle to her knee was peeled off and her knee was basically facing a direction that it should not be facing. She was able to talk to the officers and stay calm...after screaming for dear life in the beginning. She was carried off in the ambulance...and all was...kind of ok. Everyone was in shock. But yeah, that would be the first bad part of the day. Now, the good part: Carwash was fun, but cold, i got to talk to milslagle. I luv that guy, he is the sweetest man ever. He always makes me feel like im actually worth somethin in life. i love it. haha and then...this girl who is working at subway randomly comes out. She has a pen and a pad of paper in her hand and im just kinda wonderin what the hell. So she walks up to me. Says hi, i say hi. Then, she says, do you think i could have ur number? Im thinkin, WTF mate?! N then she continues with "this guy i work with is in there and he's been watchin you all afternoon and wants your number" I obviously reply with a no. So then she asks for a fake number just so he feels special. I laughed gave her sum random number and she walked away. Wow, funniest thing ever. loved it. Then, after the carwash, i went home to change cuz i was cold and wet. Then we headed over to susie's surprise party cuz she got her master's. Holy shit, i swear the whole town of darboy was over there. It was fun, for about the first 10 minutes. Then jon managed to piss me off again. So i remained pissed cuz he kept eggin me on and tryin to piss me off more and more...(which wasn't working) So then, we're playin bocce ball or somethin gay like that and we were all by the muddy puddle. Well, i have this large weighted ball in my hand...and jon is in the perfect place...hehe. So i launch the ball perfectly and get him all full of mud and water. Naturally his dad says now cara was that called for...and naturally i respond, yes ur son is a little asshole. So then i left cuz i really dint wanna put up with his or ne1 elses shit...but before i leave the yard, goobs jumps on my back, whatta kid. So yeah, i walk home. Then...thank the lord. Giesen calls. Yessss. So i do somethin w/him. He picks me up...which is good cuz i was locked out newayz. Stop to tell the parents where im goin n off we go. We chilled at his house, watched a really wierd random movie. It was a sweet one though. So yeah, that was fun, then veta came over. We watched the laker game and then after that came home. I think overall...it was a good day, with just a few gay little things. I think im lovin life again. fer now. O:-) tata fer now *~Cara Elizabeth~*

What do you do when one best friend doesn't seem to be there anymore? What do you do when the other lives what seems like a million miles away, or more? What do you do when every day you keep diggin yourself a bigger hole to live in? What do you do if the only thing you want in life is for everything to be rite and the wrongs be forgiven? What do you do when you've lost the only true love in your life? What do you do when you dont kno if you can make it thru all the pain and strife? What do you do when the only thing you want to do is cry every day n every nite? What do you do when the only wish that you have is that everything can finally be right? *It's funny how when you go through a year nothing seems to change but when you look back everything is different* I want everything to be okay. I'm sick of feeling like this. I'm sick of feeling like i'm the last resort. Like i'm only good enough when no one else is around or doing nething. I'm trying to fight my emotions, i have been for the past 11 weeks, but u kno what, im not that strong, and i can't do it nemore. I can't hold it in nemore. Emotionally, i'm weak, i can't help that, thats the way i was made. I am me and if you dont like me, i guess thats ur loss, not mine. And if you wanna surpass everything i feel, and everything that goes on in my life and act like its nothing, then fuck you. You dont even kno half the shit that goes on. Maybe cuz u dont care, or have better things to worry about, or maybe just because you're too lazy to listen. All i gotta say is that no matter what you choose, i'm always gonna be here for you. Cuz i kno what it is to be a true friend. *Life Without Friendship Is Like The Sky Without The Sun* Luv u always and forever, *~Cara Elizabeth~*

omg....so far this has been the best weekend everrrrrrr!!!! So then after the game, we headed to linz's house then tanning, then my house to get my stuff, then little caesar's, then waverly beach...LINZ'S SIS IS HAVIN A BABY!!! LINZ IS GUNNA BE AN AUNTIE!!!!! I can't give solutions to all of life's problems, doubts, or fears. But I can listen to you and together we will search for answers. I can't change your past with all it's heartache and pain, nor the future with it's untold stories. But I can be there now when you need me to care. I can't keep your feet from stumbling. I can only offer my hand that you may grasp it and not fall. Your joys, triumphs, success, and happiness are not mine; Yet I can share in your laughter. Your decisions in life are not mine to make, nor to judge; I can only support you, encourage you, and help you when you ask. I can't prevent you from falling away from friendship, from your values, from me. I can only pray for you, talk to you, and wait for you. I can't give you boundaries which I have determined for you, But I can give you the room to change, room to grow, room to be yourself. I can't keep your heart from breaking and hurting, But I can cry with you and help you pick up the pieces and put them back in place. I can't tell you who you are. I can only love you and be your friend. *~Cara Elizabeth~*

I have decided that i want to accept the responsibilities of an 8 year-old again. I want to go to McDonald's and think its a four star restaurant. I want to sail sticks across a fresh mud puddle to make a sidewalk with rocks. I want to think M&Ms are better than money cuz u can eat em'. I want to lie under a huge oak tree n run a lemonade stand w/my friends on a hot summer day. I want to return to a time when life was simple; when all u knew were colors, multiplication tables, and nursery rhymes, but it didn't bother you, cuz u dint kno what u dint kno and u dint care. All you knew was to be happy cuz u were blissfully unaware of all the things that should make you worried or upset. I want to think the world is fair. That everyone is honest and good. I want to believe that anything is possible. I want to be oblivious to the complexities of life and be overly excited by the little things again. I want to live simple again. I don't want my day to consist of computer crashes, mountains of paperwork, depressing news, how to survive more days in the month than there is money in the bank, doctor bills, gossip, illness, and loss of loved ones. I want to believe in the power of smiles, hugs, a kind word, truth, justice, peace, dreams, the imagination, mankind, and making angels in the snow. *~Cara Elizabeth~*

Too often we don't realize what we have until it is gone; Too often we wait too late to say "I'm sorry - I was wrong." Sometimes it seems we hurt the ones we hold dearest to our hearts; And we allow foolish things to tear our lives apart. Far too many times we let unimportant things into our minds; And then it's usually too late to see what made us blind. So be sure that you let people know how much they mean to you; Take that time to say the words before your time is through. Be sure that you appreciate everything you've got And be thankful for the little things in life that mean a lot. *~Cara Elizabeth~*

Today, i got ta thinkin...something i really need to work on not doing as much. But neways....i can't help but wonder why others get everything so good, like nothin could be better for them. and i get a whole lotta nothin. i mean...im not saying i have nothing nothing, im just saying....well...what did i ever do to not have happiness in my life, do i really deserve it? or is it someone's way of just having fun...to see me miserable. i dont kno, i just see everyone w/that dose of happiness that i wish i had...but i havent had it in so long and im almost certain i won't have it for even longer, if ever. and i wanna kno why that is. i just wanna be able to feel that feeling again...the way i'm supposed to, i wanna have someone to care about me and i can care about them in the same way..........i just....i wanna feel loved. i want someone to go that little extra way to make me feel special. a small flower, a little note that lets me kno he's there, or even a small smile....anything to let me kno he's by my side. i guess no matter how many friends i have, no matter how much my family cares about me, i'm always gonna have that hole in my heart....and feel that loneliness in my life....it ain't ever gonna go away...
